sections.heading: magistrates; assignment of matters
sections.text: Assignment of matters arising under the Nebraska Probate Code to clerk magistrates shall be subject to sections 24-519 and 24-520.SourceLaws 1974, LB 354, § 18, UPC § 1-309;Laws 1977, LB 167, § 2;Laws 1986, LB 529, § 46.

30-2218.Clerk magistrates; assignment of matters.

Assignment of matters arising under the Nebraska Probate Code to clerk magistrates shall be subject to sections 24-519 and 24-520.

SourceLaws 1974, LB 354, § 18, UPC § 1-309;Laws 1977, LB 167, § 2;Laws 1986, LB 529, § 46.
